class.name: eiriarm_controllers/TopicBasedHardwareInterface
class.description:
Topic-based Hardware Interface for ros2_control.
This bridge allows ros2_control to work with systems that communicate via topics, such as simulators (MuJoCo, Gazebo Classic) or real robots with topic-based drivers.
It subscribes to /joint_states and publishes to /ctrl/effort, making it compatible with existing topic-based systems without requiring code changes to the simulator or robot driver.
This is particularly useful for: - Gradual migration from topic-based to ros2_control architecture - Systems where the low-level driver uses topics (common in real robots) - Testing controllers with different simulators
